---
title: Load image (v1)
---

```{r}
#| label: check

getwd()

file.exists("images/img.png")
```

The image cannot be fetched during render:

```{r}
#| label: load-image

knitr::include_graphics("images/img.png")
```

Markdown syntax can work but requires relative path from document (ignores project working directory):
